column2:
"Oh, it's you, <%me>.
Are you here on a quest?"
"Me too. I'm helping this guy find his friend for what feels like the millionth time."
"I don't recall askin' ye to follow me all the way out 'ere, missy."
"So, where are we looking today?"
"Don't go actin' like ye didn't hear! Arr, I'll never be shot o' ye..."
"Since yer 'ere, how'd ye like t' join our little crew?"
"To tell ye the truth, me mind's ill at ease with only this lass fer company."
"Rude!"
"What's that, missy? Ye'd like me t' tell yer shipmate about all the trouble ye've gotten us into?"

"...<%me>!
How would you like to come along with us?"
"Go with Echo."
"There's something I was planning on investigating."
"Oh. Well, in that case, there's no helping it."
"Ye can't be serious. Ye'd leave me alone wi' this landlubber? Have ye no heart?"
"Well, let's get going! It's just you and me!"
"What did I do t'deserve this... Y'arr..."
"Then welcome aboard! Now, what say we maroon the lass first chance we get, and strike out wi' just the two of us?"
"I'll remember that, you little..."
"His Will Inherited"
"第1章 受け継がれる意志"
